name: Gnomies: Tower Defense <Roots of Life>
description:
In the world of "Roots of Life," gnomes live in harmony with nature, centered around their sacred tree of life. However, evil monsters have emerged, seeking to destroy the tree and disrupt the balance of the world. As a gnome defender, you must use your wit and strategic skills to protect the tree by building a network of roots and towers to fend off the enemy's advance.

The game is a tower defense-style experience where you must strategically place roots and towers along the path of the approaching monsters.

The fate of the tree and the gnome's world rests in your hands. Can you outsmart the evil monsters and defend the roots of life?

Made for 2023 Global Game Jam Vancouver:
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/gnomies-tower-defense-4

Credits:
chutiff - Art, UI
dirge - Programming, Music
PMx706D - Programming
zxbaker - Programming
